column6:
"I Hate a Mystery" (Part 3 of 3),2006,10
Mysterio, Mysterio, Mysterio! Who is the real Mysterio? It's a question that has been perplexing Spider-Man (and his fans) for quite some time, and now the web-slinger is head-to-bowl against three Mysterios! Is it all another elaborate illusion or is reality stranger than any spectacle even the true Mysterio could conjure? The answer will shock you!
32 PGS./Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | inker:Rob Campanella | writer:Peter David | colorist:Lee Loughridge | penciller:Todd Nauck | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Mike Wieringo
